questions.question: He weighs nine ……………………….
questions.description: When the word score is used after a numeral, it does not have the plural form.

questions.question: That car cost me five ……………………… dollars.
questions.description: When numerals like hundred and thousand are used after another numeral, they do not have the plural form.

questions.question: I bought three ……………………… oranges.
questions.description: When dozen is used after a numeral, it does not have a plural form.

questions.question: India won by …………………………. and three runs.
questions.description: The noun innings is always used in the singular.

questions.question: His ………………………… small but he has no debt.
questions.description: When means has the meaning of wealth, it is used in the plural.

questions.question: ……………………….. not only destroy our property but also carry disease.
questions.description: The collective noun vermin is singular in form but it is always used as a plural noun.

questions.question: The ………………………….. needs repairs.
questions.description: The possessive case is chiefly used with the names of living things.

questions.question: He has no ……………………….. for his parents.
questions.description: Respect means regard respects means compliments.

questions.question: Both countries have withdrawn their ………………………..
questions.description: Force means strength forces means troops.

questions.question: Why are you always putting on ……………………….?
We must all stand up for the common ……………………
questions.description: The common good means the interests of all.

questions.question: He wouldn’t listen to my ………………………
questions.description: Advice means counsel advices can mean information.
